location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 256 of 1837, Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to Government, Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Political Agent, Persian Field Force

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has a foliation sequence of a small number in the top right hand corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of letter 23rd April, No. 256 of 1857 and the forwarded copy of the correspondence with the chief of Ras al-Khaimah.
